procedure.title: Customize the Theme of the App

step.para: Get fonts from https://fonts.google.com/ and note the @import line at the top of the bootstrap_and_customization.css.scss file
Added classes for "center" and "navbar-brand" in the file
The center class was created simply to center the text
The navbar-brand class was created to make the font bold
Both classes were created for cases where there is not already an existing bootstrap "knob" to turn
Added a button for "Log in" on the home page as class: "btn btn-default btn-lg"
Buttons for now are still stubbed out
